verses.verse: Now <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H376>respective<s%> <S%H4289>firepans,<s%> and after <S%H5414>putting<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in them, <S%H7760>placed<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on it and <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had not <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them.
And <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> them, and they <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "It is <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'By those who <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> Me I will be <S%H6942>treated<s%> as <S%H6942>holy,<s%> And <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> I will be <S%H3513>honored.<s%>'" So <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> therefore, <S%H1826>kept<s%> <S%H1826>silent.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> also to <S%H4332>Mishael<s%> and <S%H469>Elzaphan,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Aaron's <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H5816>Uzziel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7126>"Come<s%> <S%H7126>forward,<s%> <S%H5375>carry<s%> your <S%H251>relatives<s%> <S%H5375>away<s%> from the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> to the <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>"

So they <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>forward<s%> and <S%H5375>carried<s%> them still in their <S%H3801>tunics<s%> to the <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> "Do not <S%H6544>uncover<s%> your <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6533>tear<s%> your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> so that you may not <S%H4191>die,<s%> and that He may not <S%H7107>become<s%> <S%H7107>wrathful<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%> But your <S%H251>kinsmen,<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall <S%H1058>bewail<s%> the <S%H8316>burning<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8313>brought<s%> about.

"You shall not even <S%H3318>go<s%> out from the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H4191>die;<s%> for the Lord's <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> is upon you." So they <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> then <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Do not <S%H7941>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H8354>drink,<s%> neither you <S%H408>nor<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you, when you <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> so that you may not <S%H4191>die<s%> – it is a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> –

and so as to <S%H914>make<s%> a <S%H914>distinction<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and the <S%H2455>profane,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean,<s%>

and so as to <S%H3384>teach<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to them <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> "

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to his <S%H3498>surviving<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> that is <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H3498>over<s%> from the Lord's <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

"You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it, moreover, in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it is your <S%H2706>due<s%> and your sons' <S%H2706>due<s%> out of the Lord's <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire;<s%> for <S%H3651>thus<s%> I have been <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

"The <S%H2373>breast<s%> of the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering,<s%> however, and the <S%H7785>thigh<s%> of the <S%H8641>offering<s%> you may <S%H398>eat<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with you; for they have been <S%H5414>given<s%> as your <S%H2706>due<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H2706>due<s%> out of the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> of the sons of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"The <S%H7785>thigh<s%> <S%H8641>offered<s%> by <S%H8641>lifting<s%> up and the <S%H2373>breast<s%> <S%H8573>offered<s%> by <S%H8573>waving,<s%> they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H5921>along<s%> with the <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> of the <S%H2459>portions<s%> of <S%H2459>fat,<s%> to <S%H5130>present<s%> as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> so it shall be a <S%H2706>thing<s%> <S%H5769>perpetually<s%> <S%H2706>due<s%> you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you, <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1875>searched<s%> <S%H1875>carefully<s%> for the <S%H5795>goat<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it had been <S%H8313>burned<s%> up! So he was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with Aaron's <S%H3498>surviving<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4069>"Why<s%> did you not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> at the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>? For it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> and He <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to you to <S%H5375>bear<s%> away the <S%H5771>guilt<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> since its <S%H1818>blood<s%> had not been <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H6441>inside,<s%> into the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> you should <S%H398>certainly<s%> have <S%H398>eaten<s%> it in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"

But <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> this very <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H7126>presented<s%> their <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and their <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> When things like <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7122>happened<s%> to me, if I had <S%H398>eaten<s%> a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> would it have been <S%H3190>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?"

And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [that], it <S%H3190>seemed<s%> <S%H3190>good<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight.<s%> <S%H10>Levi:<s%> 1 (NASB) Now Nadab5070 and Abihu,30 the sons1121 of Aaron,175 took3947 their respective376 firepans,4289 and after putting5414 fire784 in them, placed7760 incense7004 on it and offered7126 strange2114 fire784 before6440 the Lord,3068 which834 He had not commanded6680 them.
